org.zeromq.ZThread

type
class
available in
cpp
ZeroMQ Threading class Creates neko / cpp Threads, or forks processes (PHP). Using ZThread.fork provides the thread / process with a pre-configured ZMQ PAIR socket for 2-way communication back to the parent.

Static Methods

attach(ctx : ZContext, thread_fn : ZContext -> ZMQSocket -> Dynamic -> Void, args : Dynamic) : ZMQSocket

parameters
ctx
thread_fn
args
returns
Creates an attached thread (or forked process, for php). An attached thread/process gets a ctx and a PAIR pipe back to its parent. It must monitor its pipe, and exit if the pipe becomes unreadable.

detach(thread_fn : Dynamic -> Void, args : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
thread_fn
Create a detached thread (or forked process for php). A detached thread operates autonomously and is used to simulate a separate process. It gets no ctx or pipe socket
